    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChicken()
      adds a Chicken to the ArrayList
      void addFlyingFish()
      adds a FlyingFish to the ArrayList
      void addGuppy()
      adds a Guppy to the ArrayList
      void addSparrow()
      adds a Sparrow to the ArrayList
      void birdChoices()
      creates the menu for what type of bird the user wants and depending on the bird, the certain type will be stored into the ArrayList along with the information the user puts in for each of the questions
      void createZoo()
      Main menu, the user can pick to add animals or end game or display animals if they have added any
      void displayAnimals()
      displays the animals that are stored in the ArrayList, and if the ArrayList contains the certain Animal, then they will display their specific interfaces
      void fishChoices()
      asks the user what fish they want to add to their zoo, depending on what the user picks, it will add that certain animal into the ArrayList and sets the information the user gives into the ArrayList
      java.lang.String getName()
      gets the name of the Zoo
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main, runs the methods inside
      void setBirthdate(Animal a, Animal b, Animal c, Animal d)
      the user inputs the birthdate of the animal

      the user inputs the gender of the animal
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      sets the name of the Zoo
      <T> void setWater(Fish a, Fish b)
      the user inputs the type of water the fish lives in
      void setWeight(Animal a, Animal b, Animal c, Animal d)
      the user inputs the weight of the animal
      void setWingspan(Bird c, Bird d)
      the user enters the wingspan in cm for a bird and passes into the ArrayList
      void updateZoo()
      asks the user if they want to add a fish or a bird
      void zooName()
      asks the user for the name of the zoo
      void zooStarted()
      displays the name of the zoo
